title: How to Make the Beggar Women Go Away on Assassin's Creed

steps.headline: Just like your parents told you, killing innocent people is never the answer.
steps.description:
You should not kill the beggar woman. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/1\/10\/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/1\/10\/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-1.jpg\/v4-400px-Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"400","bigHeight":"300","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Go wherever you want and if a beggar woman comes up to you, switch to your hand and fighting style.
Next, punch the woman till she runs away.
steps.description:
You don't have to worry about doing this in front of guards, since guards will not interfere with a fist fight. They will however, go after you if you draw your weapons. You can also grab and throw the woman to make her leave. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/c\/c2\/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/c\/c2\/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-3.jpg\/v4-400px-Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"400","bigHeight":"300","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} If you run away, the beggar will throw rocks at you or ignore you.

steps.headline: If a group of beggar women come after you, you only need to punch/throw one and the whole group will leave.

text:
Just like your parents told you, killing innocent people is never the answer. You should not kill the beggar woman. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/10/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/1/10/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-1.jpg/v4-400px-Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"400","bigHeight":"300","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Go wherever you want and if a beggar woman comes up to you, switch to your hand and fighting style. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/96/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/96/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-2.jpg/v4-400px-Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"400","bigHeight":"300","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Next, punch the woman till she runs away. You don't have to worry about doing this in front of guards, since guards will not interfere with a fist fight. They will however, go after you if you draw your weapons. You can also grab and throw the woman to make her leave. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/c/c2/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/c/c2/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-3.jpg/v4-400px-Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"400","bigHeight":"300","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} If you run away, the beggar will throw rocks at you or ignore you. If a group of beggar women come after you, you only need to punch/throw one and the whole group will leave. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/43/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/4/43/Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-5.jpg/v4-400px-Make-the-Beggar-Women-Go-Away-on-Assassin%27s-Creed-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":343,"bigWidth":"400","bigHeight":"298","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}
